<<<<<<< HEAD
[The abbaye of the Holy Ghost] Alcock, John, 1430-1500, attributed name. aut
[40] p.
By Wynkyn de worde, [Enprynted at Westmestre : [1497?]]
An edition of: The abbaye of the Holy Ghost. Sometimes erroneously attributed to John Alcock--STC. Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC. Text, leaf a2r, begins: Here begynneth a matere spekynge of a place that is namid the abbaye of the holy ghost, .. Signatures: a-b⁶ c-d⁴. Imperfect; lacks title page (leaf a1). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
[The abbaye of the Holy Ghost] Alcock, John, 1430-1500, attributed name. aut
[40] p.
By Wynkyn de worde, [Enprynted at Westmestre : [1497?]]
An edition of: The abbaye of the Holy Ghost. Sometimes erroneously attributed to John Alcock--STC. Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC. Text, leaf a2r, begins: Here begynneth a matere spekynge of a place that is namid the abbaye of the holy ghost, .. Signatures: a-b⁶ c-d⁴. Imperfect; lacks title page (leaf a1). Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Wynkyn de worde
